name: Thirteen
description:
In Thirteen, you take on 3 computer opponents with the goal of playing all of your cards before the other players. A player gets rid of their cards by taking turns playing them in hands like Singles, Doubles, Triples, Straights, Chops and Bombs. Twos are the highest cards in the game.

There are many configurable options and rules including four Opponent AI Difficulty Levels and an optional on-screen Helper, which makes only cards that the player can currently play selectable.

Develop your own strategy in this challenging game of luck and skill where every new deal means a unique gameplay experience. (Similar to games like Tien Len and Pusoy Dos)

For more information and a video demo, check out the official web site www.twistedinflux.com.
